sourceDesc.p: Metadata file containing information about people referenced in the project

Ottoman Commander of the Second Army (Turkey)

person.persName: Sir Paul Humphrey Armytage Bowman , 5th Bart.

note.p: Godson of Gertrude Bell, son of Bell's colleague, Humphrey Ernest Bowman
Writer of an article in the New York Herald about Bell, published on 24th July 1921 entitled "Mesopotamia's Uncrowned Queen Guides Britain"
Iraqi politician, journalist and historian, Christian representative for Baghdad in the Council of Representatives of Iraq

person.persName: Sir Reader William Bullard , KCB, KCMG, CIE

note.p: British diplomat and author, member of the Middle Eastern Dept of the British Government Colonial Office
Member of family who have historically been in service to King Faisal's family
Acting Adviser to Iraq Ministry of Justice
Chief Assistant to the Financial Adviser to the Persian Government (Sydney Armitage-Smith)
Wife of Sir Harry Chapman Sinderson who was later doctor to Iraqi royal family
Assistant to Bell in Sir Percy's office
Younger brother of the last Qajar Shah of Iran, Ahmad Shah Qajar, and former Crown Prince of the Qajar dynasty
Half-nephew, son of Bell's half-sister, Lady Elsa Richmond
